home.text: I am a Colombian junior web developer and graphic designer, specialized in Frontend and Backend. I enjoy both layout and programming, finding satisfaction in every stage of the creative process. If you are looking for a versatile and passionate collaborator, I'm here to bring your web projects to life with a unique and captivating touch!

projects.web-design: Web Design / Front-end Developer / Back-end Developer
projects.description1: A website where Pok√©mon fans can find information about their favorite characters.
projects.description2: You can investigate the characters that reside in various galaxies and know their vital status.
projects.description3: Simulation of a virtual appliance store with the ability to filter by search.
projects.description5: User registration by name, email and age
projects.description6: Explore your destiny with our Fortune Cookie website. Find inspiring predictions and advice with just one click. Discover what the future has in store for you!
projects.description7: Web portfolio developed with HTML and CSS
projects.description9: Full stack web application simplifies user and password management! Register, validate and change passwords securely and efficiently. A complete solution for online identity management.
projects.description10: Discover country data dynamically. Filter by language and access key information such as population, capital and continent. Explore the world quickly and easily!
projects.description11: Website developed using HTML CSS and JavaScript

habilities.title: Skills are important, but not all of them have to be technical
habilities.p: In my career as a web developer, I not only stand out for my solid technical skills, but also for my soft skills that enrich my contribution to the team. My ability to communicate effectively facilitates understanding of client needs, while my collaborative approach ensures seamless integration with teammates.
habilities.reverse1: Efficiency, quality and constant learning, benefiting customer satisfaction and professional reputation.
habilities.reverse2: Effective collaboration, fluid communication and creation of quality products.
habilities.reverse3: Optimizes aesthetics, solves problems and improves the user experience
habilities.reverse4: Understand user needs and design more satisfying and accessible experiences.

footer.t: If you want to contact me, leave me a message!
footer.name: Name
